name: spo-export-all-customformatting
title: Backup all custom formatting on a site
shortDescription: A script that let's you easily backup all custom formatting on a site
longDescription: A script that let's you easily backup all custom formatting on a site, demonstrating the use of the -Includes property to minimize the number of requests to the SharePoint.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
